Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: ‘Valid’ for me relates to what is solid and justifiable.   When I affirm for myself that my emotions and my experiences are valid, I’m reminding myself that I’m allowed to feel whatever I feel. It’s a real experience and it matters.   When I was relying entirely on external validation, I was in a place of feeling ‘I’m not ok unless you tell me I’m ok’. Or conversely...I’m experiencing pain and struggle, but I don’t feel justified in that experience unless someone else affirms that for me.
